member.name: DROPFILES
member.summary: Defines the CF_HDROP clipboard format. The data that follows is a double null-terminated list of file names.

member.name: DROPFILES.pFiles
member.summary: The offset of the file list from the beginning of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: DROPFILES.pt
member.summary: The drop point. The coordinates depend on fNC.

member.name: DROPFILES.fNC
member.summary: A nonclient area flag. If this member is TRUE, pt specifies the screen coordinates of a point in a window's nonclient area. If it is FALSE, pt specifies the client coordinates of a point in the client area.

member.name: DROPFILES.fWide
member.summary: A value that indicates whether the file contains ANSI or Unicode characters. If the value is zero, the file contains ANSI characters. Otherwise, it contains Unicode characters.
